thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Whiting Petroleum Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Whiting Petroleum Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.16
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Whiting Petroleum Corp:
* ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.26 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 2018 AVERAGE PRODUCTION OF 127,050 BOE/D ABOVE MIDPOINT OF GUIDANCE
* QTRLY TOTAL OPERATING REVENUES $515.1 MILLION VERSUS $371.3 MILLION
* SEES Q2 PRODUCTION 11 MMBOE - 11.5 MMBOE
* AS WE MOVE THROUGH Q2 INTO SUMMER MONTHS, PLAN TO INCREASE PACE OF OPERATIONS IN BAKKEN
* SEES FY PRODUCTION 46.5 MMBOE - 47.2 MMBOE
* SEES FULL-YEAR 2018 CAPITAL BUDGET OF $750 MILLION
* REDUCED Q2 2018 OUTLOOK TO REFLECT IMPACT OF UNSCHEDULED GAS PLANT MAINTENANCE FOR MAJORITY OF MONTH OF MAY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
